Title: Long live the proletarian revolutionary line with Chairman Mao as its representative!
Designer: Central Art Academy Blockprint combat group (中央美术学院版画战斗组)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Lin Biao is the inventor of the Little Red Book and the architect of the Mao cult. After Liu Shaoqi's downfall, he becomes Mao's designated successor. In 1971, he dies under mysterious circumstances.
